# presentedTime

**Instance Property**

The host time, in seconds, when the drawable was displayed onscreen.

## Declaration

```swift
var presentedTime: CFTimeInterval { get }
```

## Discussion

Typically, you query this property in a callback method. See [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLDrawable/addPresentedHandler(_:)].

The property value is `0.0` if the drawable hasn’t been presented or if its associated frame was dropped.

## Getting presentation information

- **addPresentedHandler(_:)**: Registers a block of code to be called immediately after the drawable is presented.
